name: Big 3 Ramp 3×5 (Squat/Bench/Dead)
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 main sets x ~5 reps each + rest ~2 min
overview_and_execution: Hit 3 ascending sets of 5 on the big lifts. E.g. 70%×5, 80%×5, 90%×5. If the top set is successful, slightly increase next session.
important_notes: Simple ramp used in many strength programs. Keep rest 2-3 minutes. Good for quick progression without excessive volume.
